songs.title: Gol Gol
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Anmol ni bade, anmol ni mainu lagde bade anmol

[Hook (x3)]
Gol gol ni jhede, gol gol ni jhede jhumke
Jhede tere kol gol
Anmol ni mainu, anmol ni mainu
Lagde mainu bade anmol

[Bridge]
Tere liye hai, Ye mera dil
Tere liye hai, Yeh mehfil
Tere liye hai, Ye mera dil
Tere liye hai, Yeh mehfil

[Verse 1]
Nale tere layi main taur kaddi
Tere layi galbaat sari
Tere layi sutta ni main kal raat saari
Udan peena main Hennessy
Par tere nal behke pee gaya main
Bottle Ciroc di hun sari
Hun
Gol gol sara jag ghume gol gol
Hun main bina soche kara jo tu bol
Hun
Gol gol sara jag ghume gol
Beh gaya ik hor bottle main khol
Ve ve! Mera remote control sohniye kol
Ishareyan te sohni mainu tol
Hun main GPS sattelite vangu
Ird-gird ghuma tere gol gol

[Hook (x2)]
Gol gol ni jhede, gol gol ni jhede jhumke
Jhede tere kol gol
Anmol ni mainu, anmol ni mainu
Lagde mainu bade anmol

[Bridge]
Tere liye hai, Ye mera dil
Tere liye hai, Yeh mehfil
Tere liye hai, Ye mera dil
Tere liye hai, Yeh mehfil

[Outro]
Gol gol ni jhede, gol gol ni jhede jhumke
Jhede tere kol gol
Anmol ni mainu, anmol ni mainu
Lagde mainu bade anmol
